name: zigbee2wifi router
summary: zigbee2wifi is a linux based router for routing zigbee devices to wifi
short_description:
This linux based system will provide
a. adhoc network router between zigbee mesh
to wifi mesh network
b. acts like a bridge for zigbee devices for connecting over wifi network.
c. acts like a router between wifi to zigbee network
The system will contain implementation of
linux netfilter driver for mapping 
incoming connections.
The application configure the mapping of
different devices and route the devices
based on user configuration.
Creating multiple profiles and configuring the
protocol profile over zigbee for zigbee
devices. 
php based web application for configuring
over web.
CUI - command line user interface
for cofiguring over ssh or telnet.
The overall project will try to implement
a efficent router application which
can be used to configure devices into
multiple profiles like smart energy etc.
The RF4CE can also be supported to
allow remote confrol of wifi de
T
